<script>
(() => {
  const el = document.getElementById("last-updated");
  const pdfUrl = "./assets/cv.pdf";

  const formatGB = (d) =>
    d.toLocaleDateString("en-GB", { day: "2-digit", month: "long", year: "numeric" });

  fetch(pdfUrl, { method: "HEAD", cache: "no-store" })
    .then(res => {
      const lm = res.headers.get("last-modified");
      if (!lm) throw new Error("no last-modified");
      const d = new Date(lm);
      if (Number.isNaN(d.getTime())) throw new Error("bad date");
      el.textContent = `Last updated: ${formatGB(d)}`;
    })
    .catch(() => {
      el.textContent = "Last updated: Unavailable";
    });
})();
</script>
